title: System Actors and Internal Components
content:
graph TD
    subgraph System
        direction LR
        Coordinator["ðŸ¤– Coordinator Agent"]
        Playbook["ðŸ“– Playbook"]
        Playbook -- "Defines dataflow for" --> Coordinator
    end

    User["ðŸ‘¤ User"]
    Agents["ðŸ¤– External Agents"]

    User -- "Interacts with" --> System

    UserNote["A person defined by their specialty (e.g., finance, legal)."]
    AgentsNote["AI entities specialized in a single topic, providing or receiving data."]
    CoordinatorNote["A system component that reads the Playbook to facilitate communication between external agents."]
    PlaybookNote["A set of rules that decides how data from one agent is delivered to another."]

    User -.-> UserNote
    Agents -.-> AgentsNote
    Coordinator -.-> CoordinatorNote
    Playbook -.-> PlaybookNote

    style UserNote fill:#e1f5fe,stroke:#333
    style AgentsNote fill:#e8f5e9,stroke:#333
    style CoordinatorNote fill:#fff9c4,stroke:#333
    style PlaybookNote fill:#f3e5f5,stroke:#333
